title: Lord Seventh - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Romance   Shounen Ai   Wuxia
tags: Age Progression   Ancient China   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Devoted Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Lazy Protagonist   Leadership   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Low-key Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Misunderstandings   Past Plays a Big Role   Poisons   Politics   Pragmatic Protagonist   Reincarnation   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Secrets   Sleeping   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past   Unrequited Love   Wars
author: Priest
description: Waking up again in his seventh reincarnation, Prince Jing Beiyuan found himself back in time, when everything had yet to be set in motion. Having been given a second chance, Beiyuan has to survive court and decide whether it was finally time for him to let go of his feelings or not, all while trying to handle the youthful, innocent force of nature that had suddenly barged into his already complicated life.>
